properties.name: app.data.init
properties.description: Flag whether to initialize database when application starts.

properties.name: app.client.allowedOrigin
properties.description: The origin for which cross-origin requests are allowed from a client's browser.

properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret value used when getting algorithm that verifies or signs JWT.

properties.name: app.security.permitall
properties.description: Allows access to all URLs of the application.
